name: run_ticket_workflow
description:
End-to-end spec-agent ticket handler.

Given a natural-language ticket description, this tool:
- Indexes the current working tree (if needed)
- Creates a task bound to the repo/branch
- Generates a plan (and boundary specs)
- Optionally generates patches

It returns the task id, status, and 'next step' hints for the caller.

description.title: Description
description.description: Ticket text / what you want changed.

client.title: Client
client.description: Editor/chat client name (e.g. cursor, claude, copilot).

repo_path.title: Repo Path
repo_path.description: Absolute repo path. Defaults to current working directory.

branch.title: Branch
branch.description: Branch name. Defaults to current git branch.

generate_patches.title: Generate Patches
generate_patches.description: If true, run plan + specs + approve-plan + generate-patches (non-interactive defaults).
